mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select * from ( (select rownum rnum, N.* from (select * from tbl_board order by bno desc) N) ) where rnum between ${startRow} and ${endRow}
select * from ( (select rownum rnum, N.* from (select * from tbl_board order by bno desc) N) ) where rnum between ${startRow} and ${endRow}
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno > 0
